document.full_text: south africa backs the african union in recognizing alassane ouattara as the winner of ivory coast's disputed presidential election, president jacob zuma said on thursday.
document.title: south africa recognizes ouattara as winner in ivory coast
lines_and_colors: south africa backs the african union in recognizing alassane ouattara as the winner of ivory coast's disputed presidential election, president jacob zuma said on thursday.
